wonder.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to think about something that you are not sure about and try to guess what is true, what will happen etc
wonder.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He’s been leaving work early a lot – it makes you wonder, doesn’t it?
I wonder how James is getting on.
What are they going to do now, I wonder?
I wonder if I’ll recognize Philip after all these years.
wonder.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to feel surprised and unable to believe something
wonder.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: He’ll come back soon enough, I shouldn’t wonder.
Sometimes I wonder about his behaviour.
I wonder how he dares to show his face!
wonder.translation[0].definitions[2].def: to doubt or question whether something is true
wonder.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: Sometimes I wonder if he’s got any sense at all!
wonder.translation[0].note_box[0].items[: I wonder what she’ll say when she finds out
You wonder  what would happen if something else happened (when talking about imaginary situations)
I wonder what would happen if I said that I was leaving
You wonder if you should do something
I wonder if we should tell her
wonder.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a feeling of surprise and admiration for something very beautiful or new to you
wonder.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The sight of the Taj Mahal filled us with wonder.
wonder.translation[1].definitions[1].def: something that makes you feel surprise and admiration
wonder.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: the Seven Wonders of the World
wonder.translation[1].definitions[2].def: someone who is good at doing difficult things
